mapper.select: SELECT cart_id AS cartId ,quantity ,is_deleted AS isDeleted ,member_id AS memberId ,product_id AS productId FROM cart WHERE 1=1 AND is_deleted = 0 AND cart_id = #{cartId}

SELECT c.cart_id AS cartId ,c.quantity AS quantity ,p.price AS price ,p.name AS productName ,p.product_id AS productId ,p.rating AS rating ,f.path AS filePath FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id JOIN file f ON f.file_id = p.file_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT c.quantity ,p.price AS price ,c.member_id AS memberId ,c.product_id AS productId FROM cart c JOIN product p ON p.product_id = c.product_id WHERE 1=1 AND c.is_deleted = 0 AND c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.product_id = #{productId}
